summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Voice Command Overlay Electron app. All backend APIs and frontend flows working correctly in demo mode.

minor_issues.issue: Intent parsing extracts 'Mail' instead of 'John' for 'Send mail to John' command
minor_issues.impact: Minor parsing accuracy issue in mock mode

passed_tests: Backend health endpoint returns correct status
Models status endpoint shows ASR and LLM info
Gmail status endpoint returns connection info
Intent parsing correctly identifies email vs unknown commands
Email drafting generates proper email structure
Email sending works in demo mode
Setup wizard complete flow (Welcome → Models → Gmail → Ready)
Desktop view loads with correct title and status
Overlay trigger button activates listening state
Listening pill shows with waveform, dismiss and stop buttons
Stop recording transitions to processing then email card
Email card pre-fills with parsed intent (To: Sarah, Subject: rescheduling)
Email send button works and shows success pill
Success pill auto-dismisses and returns to hidden state
Cancel button dismisses overlay back to hidden state
